TopicTitle: Embracing my inner Danny2462: the Polish Notation Mun Rocket

Articles.Content:
I decided to make a video, for a change. I had the urge to make myself a rather silly rocket and fly it out to the Mun. And so I did. And zaniness ensued.

Enjoy!
Polish Notation Mun Rocket? Don't be silly. Everyone knows Polan cannot into space.
now that gave me an idea for a new rover launcher...

Nice video. I was entertained.

I have to wonder why you right-click all your engines and stuff though when you're undocking ships. Gotta start using action groups! They're the best

Okay, that got some laughs out of me! Good one!

Also: first time I've ever seen YouTube offer 1440p for a HD resolution! Very nice!

I'm glad people enjoyed it! I'm still getting used to this particular bit of recording software, and am still new to AviSynth, so there's still a fair bit I have to learn. Hopefully future videos will be properly framed and have better timing on edits.

Okay, that got some laughs out of me! Good one!

Also: first time I've ever seen YouTube offer 1440p for a HD resolution! Very nice!

14440p !!!

YAY More people infected by the Dannybug.

Awesome idea. I'm tempted to try it myself just for the IVA shots. XD
